name: personal fear
description:
this is a game about a personal fear of mine

this is a thing i made on twine in my spare time while home with my dad, rather than alone. i wasn't feeling great though, since my mom wasn't home and she's a comfort and i have mild separation anxiety from her

misspellings and minor grammatical errors may have happened and i am sorry i was kind of just going with the flow

i cried making this for some reason

the cover image is just a quick mspaint doodle i made  idk what i was going for but whatever

it has minor choices in the beginning but it becomes linear no matter what at some point. no multi ending thing going on here, just me letting out a fear

so its sort of a vent
